page.title: 15STAMP COLLECTING
page.content: I collect stamps. Stamps are pieces of paper with perforated edges. They are used as fee's for sending letters. Some ofthe first stamps are worth a lot of money nowadays. New stamps are issued every 2 months. The penny black was the first stamp to be issued and now is worth over Â£l5000. We stick stamps on envelopes to show whether they go first class (which means it will go faster through the post). Or second class which is slower. In my collection I think I've got about l000 stamps. One of the stamps I've got is worth a hundred pounds.
